name: Gensim NLP
description: Gensim is a Python library for topic modelling, document indexing and similarity retrieval with large corpora. Target audience is the natural language processing (NLP) and information retrieval (IR) community.

bow.name: Bag of Words
bow.description: Bag of Words is a method for representing text as a bag of words, i.e. a list of words with their frequencies.

similarity.name: Similarity Index
similarity.description: Build Similarity Index is a method for building a similarity index for a document.
similarity.info: Similarity Index allows to find similar documents in a corpus.

similarity_query.name: Query Similarity Index
similarity_query.description: Query Similarity Index is a method for querying a similarity index for a document.
